page.title: 06UNCLE TOM & AUNTY MOLLY
page.content: You may think that our Uncle Tom and Aunty Molly are just two people who live in Cassop and get on with their own lives,but they do a great deal for the village. They organise events for the young and the elderly.Aunty Molly makes cakes for special occasions.We think that if it wasn't for them life in the village would not be as good. On Sports Day Uncle Tom was up at 6.30 a.m putting tents up and organising the races.In the afternoon Aunty Molly was busy selling hot-dogs and drinks.It was a brilliant day and everyone enjoyed it. In the evening they held a family disco for all ages. This piece is about Mr.& Mrs.T.Wilson. At the moment Aunty Molly is busy with about 50 cakes,she will ice them all herself.
